Flow.description: Added Referral Acceptance, Origin and Profile
Flow.label: Risk: Create High Risk Alert

fields.name: NewCaseText
fields.fieldText:
A new individual case for the participant has been created.


Click Next to record the Session & Case Note related to the High Risk.

screens.description: Confirming the actions that have been taken by the end user
screens.name: Confirmation_Screen
screens.label: Final Screen

fields.name: Confirmation_Text
fields.fieldText:
The Session & Case Note related to the High Risk has been created on the individual participant's case.


Click Finish to exit the flow.

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_create_an_individual_case_and_risk_for_the_participant
fields.fieldText: Do you want to create an individual case and risk for the participant?

fields.name: Contact_Group
fields.fieldText: Select the related participant to attach to the risk

validationRule.errorMessage: Additional Information cannot exceed 32768 characters.

fields.name: High_Risk_Created_Text
fields.fieldText:
The High Risk for the participant has been created and attached to the group case and individual case.


﻿Click Next to record the Session & Case Note related to the High Risk.

fields.name: Missing_Contact_Text
fields.fieldText:
Missing Contact:


You have chosen to create an individual case and risk but have not chosen a contact.

Please return to the previous screen and select a contact or select "No" to creating a an individual contact/risk.

fields.name: No_General_Contact_Text
fields.fieldText:
Missing Contact:


To create a high risk you must at a minimum have a general contact associated with the enquiry case.

validationRule.errorMessage: Additional Information cannot exceed 32768 characters.
Additional Information cannot exceed 32768 characters.
